author: Jack Clark
description: We've created a robotics system, trained entirely in simulation and deployed on a physical robot, which can learn a new task after seeing it done once.     Watch Video            Domain RandomizationOne-shot imitation learningRead more Algorithms Last month, we showed an earlier version of this robot where we'd trained its vision system
title: Robots that Learn

author: Tony Lee
title: Bionic skin that's 3D printed could give robots a human touch

description: Japan is crazy about robotics, from the super advanced and bipedal to tiny robot bullet trains that will deliver your sushi order.
title: 6 Things Every Robot Fan Needs To Do in Tokyo - IGN Video

author: Ellen Huet, Jillian Ward
description: A Silicon Valley startup is the guardian of the building blocks of robot life.
title: The Not-So-Secret Code That Powers Robots Around the Globe

author: Yi Shu Ng
description: Soon, there might be nobody to welcome our robot overlords.
title: Japan is using robots for everything because there just aren't enough people

author: April Glaser
description: Meanwhile, other states are passing laws broadly permitting the robots statewide.
title: San Francisco is considering legislation that would ban sidewalk delivery robots

author: Christopher Trout
description: Why your first sex robot won’t have a penis
title: Blow-up dolls, vibrators and the sex robot’s uninspired origins

author: Claudia Bracholdt
description: Wir werden in Zukunft mehr mit unseren technischen Geräten kommunizieren als mit anderen Menschen, glaubt Joanne Pransky. Sie beschäftigt sich schon jetzt mit der Beziehung zwischen Mensch und Roboter.
title: Künstliche Intelligenz: Die Roboter-Psychiaterin

author: Claudia Bracholdt

title: Künstliche Intelligenz: Geht ein Roboter zum Psychologen

author: Kim Rixecker
description: Mit Roboschool hat die unter anderem von Elon Musk unterstützte OpenAI-Initiative einen quelloffenen Simulator für Roboter veröffentlicht.
title: Elon Musks OpenAI-Initiative veröffentlicht quelloffenen Roboter-Simulator
